Demos are topics that explain a feature at an example. The demo may be explorably in full depth only in the offline project. When you write a demo:

  • Place the demo topic in the /demos/ subfolder of the documentation.
  • Use the special model page for demos and keep the already given structure as far as possible.
  • Use the special Demo Source content to provide sources in suitable format online and offline.
  • If you use your own content types for the demo, add them under /schemas/demo/ in the documetation module and do not forget to alter the site-map configuration for the /demos/ subsite (or make your demo page an own subsite).
Check out the style of existing demos before you write your first demo!
